title: Perform a Fuel System Test
description: On a newly built aircraft, engineers must test the entire fuel system, including pumps, valves, and gauges.

tasks.description: Fill the aircraft's fuel tanks to various levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent oversees the fueling of the aircraft.

tasks.description: Operate the fuel pumps and valves to simulate transferring fuel between different tanks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a test script and confirms fuel transfers correctly.

tasks.description: Verify that the fuel quantity gauges in the cockpit provide accurate readings for each tank.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares the gauge readings to the known fuel quantity and confirms they are accurate within tolerance.
